import React from 'react' import {startGetUser} from '../../actions/userAction' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class CustomerInfo extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstName:'', lastName:'', address:'', phno:'', email:'', gender:'', infoEdit:true } } componentDidMount =()=>{ this.props.dispatch(startGetUser()) const refersh = setInterval( () =>{ if(this.props.users.length ) { clearInterval(refersh) this.setState({ firstName:this.props.users[0].firstName, lastName:this.props.users[0].lastName, address:this.props.users[0].address, phno:this.props.users[0].mobile, email:this.props.users[0].email }) } } , 1000) } handleInfoEdit = () => { this.setState( {infoEdit:false}) } handleChange = (e) =>{ this.setState ({ [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } render(){ return(
